entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few showers except flurries over higher terrain. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2 except low minus 1 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2 except low minus 1 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023
